text:
The                                            
  Securities                                     
  and Exchange                                   
  Commission                                     
  has not                                        
  necessarily                                    
  reviewed the                                   
  information                                    
  in this                                        
  filing and                                     
  has not                                        
  determined if                                  
  it is                                          
  accurate and                                   
  complete.                                      
  The reader                                     
  should not                                     
  assume that                                    
  the                                            
  information                                    
  is accurate                                    
  and complete.                                  
                 UNITED STATES   OMB APPROVAL    
                 SECURITIES AND    OMB Number:   
                 EXCHANGE        3235-0006       
                 COMMISSION          Estimated   
                 Washington,     average burden  
                 D.C. 20549          hours per   
                 FORM 13F        response:       
                 FORM 13F COVER  23.8            
                 PAGE                            
                                                 
The institutional investment manager filing this
report and the person by whom it is signed hereby
represent that the person signing the report is
authorized to submit it, that all information
contained herein is true, correct and complete,
and that it is understood that all required
items, statements, schedules, lists, and tables,
are considered integral parts of this form.
